text:
Farmer! You know how I ask you for extra coal every winter because I run out?

Well, I'm getting smarter! I want to stock up on coal but I can only fit so much in my barn.

Can you bring 300 Wooden Planks to Frank to expand my barn?
uponCompletion:
Hahaha! You should see the look on your face! I'm just kidding!

I don't have room to expand my barn.
